definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: This chemical change can be expressed by an equation.
sentences.chinese: 我們可用反應式表示這種化學變化。

sentences.english: The method and skill for balancing a complex oxid - reduction reaction equation are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹複雜氧化還原反應式配平的方法和技巧。

sentences.english: How do you avoid a life of reactionary workflow?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何避免反應式工作流的？
